meanings.sent1: Her appellation is 'Princess' in our game of make-believe.
meanings.sent2: The appellation 'Doctor' signifies someone who has completed medical school.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly gave himself the appellation of 'Master of the Remote Control'.
meanings.sent4: In the world of superheroes, his appellation was 'The Invisible Avenger'.
meanings.sent5: The appellation 'Queen Bee' stuck with her throughout high school.

meanings.definition: A geographical indication used to identify where a wine comes from.
meanings.sent1: The appellation 'Napa Valley' is famous for its wine production.
meanings.sent2: When choosing a wine, pay attention to the appellation on the label.
meanings.sent3: He proudly displayed a bottle with the appellation 'Champagne' to impress his guests.
meanings.sent4: The appellation 'Bordeaux' evokes images of rolling vineyards and historic chateaus.
meanings.sent5: Winemakers strive to meet the strict standards of their designated appellation.
